name: Cookie Maestro
author: Denver Sessink

sections.description:
Cookie Maestro is your full featured solution for your website. It features Cookie Scanning, Cookie Message and last but not least: Blocking cookies untill your website Agrees with your cookie policy (which is required by the GDPR law).

After adding your domain to your Cookie Maestro Dashboard (https://www.cookiemaestro.nl/), you will receive your personal Cookie Maestro key. Use this key in this plug-in and you are ready!
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/cookiemaestro directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Use the Settings->Cookie Maestro screen to configure the plugin
  4. Insert your Cookie Maestro key (provided by https://www.cookiemaestro.nl/) and save settings.
sections.faq:
Is Cookie Maestro available in English?

No, not yet! We first aim to provide a full featured solution at https://www.cookiemaestro.nl (Dutch). English will be available as soon as possible.

Is Cookie Maestro Free?

Yes, it is free for small websites. Full featured! Read more at https://www.cookiemaestro.nl/prijzen (Dutch).
sections.changelog:
1.1

  • Updated this plugin to render the cookie listing properly.

1.0

  • First release of Cookie Maestro plugin.
